text: Oebbi d tafat n tmurt akked igenwan. Amedya n tafat iS d takwap degs taftilt. Taftilt daxel n tqeoaap. Taqeoaap, amzun d itri acoaoaq, tecaal it ttejoa ioqan, tazemmurt ur nelli n ugmuv ne$ n utaram. Qoib a pfet zzit is, ur p tennul tmes. Tafat $ef tafat. Ippawi Oebbi win i S ihwan ar tafat iS. Ippak ed Oebbi imedyaten i medden. Oebbi Ieoa yal cci
